info.title: API de Rewrite
info.summary: Referencia de la API de proyectos (Projects, API Keys, Templates, Webhooks).
info.description:
Referencia publica completa de los endpoints de nivel proyecto en Rewrite API v1.

Todos los endpoints devuelven un sobre consistente (`ok`, `data` y `cursor` opcional).
Usa bearer token (API key) con scopes o sesion autenticada por cookie.

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: Crear, listar y revocar API keys de proyecto.

get.description: Devuelve las API keys activas del proyecto con paginacion por cursor.\n\nUsa `limit`, `after` y `before` para paginar.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'GET',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("GET", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

post.description: Crea una API key del proyecto y devuelve el secreto una sola vez. Guardalo de forma segura.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"Jobs worker","scopes":["project:templates:read","projects:webhooks:read"]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"Jobs worker\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"Jobs worker\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"Jobs worker\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"Jobs worker","scopes":["project:templates:read","projects:webhooks:read"]}'

delete.description: Revoca una API key inmediatamente por key id.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'DELETE',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("DELETE", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X DELETE 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

bearerAuth.description: Envia tu API key como `Authorization: Bearer <api-key>`.

after.name: after
after.description: ID unico de cursor para obtener elementos despues de este valor.

before.name: before
before.description: ID unico de cursor para obtener elementos antes de este valor.

persist.description: Indica si se puede solicitar otra pagina usando `next`.

next.description: Cursor para solicitar la siguiente pagina (`after`).

Cursor.description: Metadatos de cursor para respuestas paginadas.

OkEmptyResponse.description: Respuesta exitosa. Este endpoint no devuelve datos.

prefix.description: Prefijo de clave publica para identificacion.

APIKey.description: Metadatos de API key del proyecto (el secreto no se vuelve a devolver).

APIKeyCreateBody.description: Crea una API key de proyecto con scopes opcionales.

APIKeyCreateResponse.description: Respuesta de creacion que contiene la clave secreta de un solo uso.

AuthScope.description: Scope de permiso aceptado por API keys.
